summary: An executed samurai takes an existential journey throughout time, space and eternity in search of bloody vengeance.
cast: Kazuya Nakayama|Kaori Momoi|Ryûhei Matsuda|Ryôsuke Miki|Yûya Uchida|Masumi Okada|Hiroki Matsukata|Hiroshi Katsuno|Masato|Bob Sapp|Takeshi Kitano|Daijirô Harada|Taisaku Akino|Chisato Amate|Takeshi Caesar|Joe Cappelletti|Mickey Curtis|Ken'ichi Endô|Michael Forest|Jessica Gee-George|Ryûji Harada|Yoshio Harada|Kate Higgins|Megan Hollingshead|Renji Ishibashi|Yûdai Ishiyama|Tsurutarô Kataoka|Kirin Kiki|Shigeo Kobayashi|Miyuki Komagata|Steve Kramer|Dave Mallow|Kazuhiro Mashiko|Michael McConnohie|Yasukaze Motomiya|Hiroyuki Nagato|Mari Nakayama|Liam O'Brien|Ken Ogata|Mitsuhiro Oikawa|Sam Riegel|Tokitoshi Shiota|Christopher Corey Smith|Harumi Sone|Melodee Spevack|Doug Stone|Kim Strauss|Shun Sugata|Haruna Takase|Teah|Susumu Terajima|Kirk Thornton|Kazuki Tomokawa|Hitoshi Yamaguchi|Tarô Yamamoto|Joe Yamanaka|Rikiya Yasuoka|Hideji Ôtaki
title: Izo
